name: Damn Sewer
description:
An indie horror game in which you find yourself in a mysterious abandoned sewer where people disappear. At first there is nothing unusual, but gradually you realize that something terrible lives in the sewer. Will you be able to get out of the sewer without falling into the clutches of its inhabitants?


The player's task is to find a way out of the sewer. Ahead of the player awaits a monster and traps and other difficulties. Also search keys and much more that awaits you in this game. You need to find exits and eventually reach the final exit. But can you find the right way out...
